short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re-enable right-click functionality on sites that disable it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right Click Enabler restores the ability to use the right-click function on websites that disable it. This extension helps you regain control over your browsing experience by allowing you to access standard context menu options, such as 'Copy', 'Paste', and 'Inspect Element'. Simple to use and effective, the Right Click Enabler is an essential tool for web developers, researchers, and anyone who needs unrestricted access to web content. Enhance your browsing with just one click!
